name: Hidden Creek Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: Great place, great, room, great hosts, BEST BREAKFAST
reviews.text: The reviews here say it all. Hidden Creek is a gem—the Ritz Carlton of B&B's. The rooms are beautiful and thoughtfully decorated; so comfortable and luxurious. Every amenity is available: laundry, dvds, jacuzzi, books, tv, cable, wi-fi, et al. One recommendation: if you're allergic to dogs, take your allergy medicine (it's worth it to stay here). Even though the cute, sweet family dog stays off the B&B floor, I still had a little sniffle. I want to live at Hidden Creek forever. Oh, and I haven't even mentioned the to-die-for breakfast. I think that it was the best breakfast I've ever had.

reviews.title: We'll be back - every time we stay at Alyeska!
reviews.text: They think of everything, including things we didn't even realize we'd like! And the breakfast is above and beyond anyone's expectation. The best B&B we've ever visited!

reviews.title: A perfect 10
reviews.text: This place is awesome, the owners/host are amazing, warm and friendly. My husband and I stayed here for only one night but could have easily made this our home! They have left no stone unturned in providing the most comfortable, anything you might need, accommodation for their guest. And then there is the breakfast, a menu mind you, that was fabulous. We always stay in Bed and Breakfast, but they may have ruined us from staying at all others! Very clean, nicely appointed and very private

reviews.title: Wish we'd stayed longer!
reviews.text: My family and I (2 adults and one child) stayed at Hidden Creek Bed and Breakfast on 12/22/23 (1 night) just to get out of the busy pre-holiday chaos in Anchorage. We usually settled with Alyeska Resort Hotel not because we liked there so much, but just because we know the hotel so well , having been there many times. I chose the Bed and Breakfast this time after reading all the positive comments/reviews in Trip Advisor.com. It took me a little courage to break the old habit, but I’m so glad that I did it. In Trip Advisor, some people described this B&B as “the best place I’ve ever stayed,” and I totally agree them! I’ve stayed a B&B in Japan, Canada, Portland, OR, Florence, OR, Soldotna, AK, Fairbanks, AK, but Hidden Creek ranks the best one in our list so far. Michelle and Ron’s excellent hospitality, resourceful information about local areas were just amazing. We enjoyed Michelle’s excellent culinary skills and services at the breakfast as if we were at a restaurant. We also enjoyed delightful conversations with Ron, which made my husband feel like he didn’t want to leave so soon :-) Our favorite was the hot tub, just outside by the common area down stairs. The room we stayed was clean and specious. My daughter and I were excited about the king size murphy bed since we'd never seen before. We were also surprised by the many books, photographs, maps, games, and DVDs in the common area. The entire area that we had access to is impeccably decorated with very nice art, pottery, and craft. It was an art gallery in the Bed and Breakfast. The magnificent stained glass window in the breakfast area is a master piece. Although we couldn’t ski as much as we wanted to because of the warm, rainy weather on that day, we were able to relax and enjoy our trip to Girdwood. Thank you, Michelle and Ron. A great new year to you!

reviews.title: Best B & B in Alaska
reviews.text: Quite possibly the best bed & breakfast in Alaska, and more comfortable and friendlier than most fancy resorts. The house was designed to be a B&B, with the whole lower level for guests. Rooms are spacious -- each with its own bathroom and even they are spacious. Breakfasts are in a beautiful dining area with a stained glass window depicting native flowers/plants. Breakfasts are tasty and feature local foods (e.g., reindeer sausage). Ron and Michelle and great hosts. The house is up on a hill and yes, there is a hidden creek near the property that you can hear but not see.

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.text: Of all the places we stayed in Alaska, this was the best. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, there is a shared living room with entertainments and internet-accessible computer, the food is terrific with personalized menus and plenty of options. It is impossible to describe what a perfect oasis it is!

reviews.title: best bed and breakfast I ever stayed at
reviews.text: The location is tucked away in a residential neighborhood, and it is hard to imagine staying here without a car.

reviews.title: Best Hidden Gem in Girdwood
reviews.text: best bed and breakfast I ever stayed at and I have stayed at a lot. from the outstanding house, rooms, facilities to the hospitality of the hosts. it was first class all the way. the breakfast was amazing from the personalized menus, to the selection of food, and to the company of the host. have a really friendly puppy as well. would highly reccomend it . best place we stayed at in alaska. would do it again. :)

reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.title: Everything you would want in a B & B
reviews.text: By far, the best accomodations we had during a two week trip to Alaska, and quite possibly the best B & B we have ever stayed at, Hidden Creek was perfect, as far as my wife and I were concerned. Ron and Michelle provide wonderful service, and make you feel as if you are staying with friends. From the size and quality of the rooms, to the amazing breakfasts, with personalized menus provided each day, they went the extra mile to make their guests feel welcome.

reviews.title: If you want to be pampered -- STAY HERE
reviews.text: I know I am repeating myself, but I'm reaching for all the superlatives I can find. The location is residential, so you will have to drive, but everything in Girdwood is close by. My only regret is that we only spent two nights at this great B & B.

reviews.title: Great Place to Stay
reviews.text: We really do not know where to begin except this is the most fantastic B&B. There was not one little thing of extra care that Michelle and Ron had not thought about.

reviews.title: Everything you could want in a B&B
reviews.text: The pictures on their website is exactly what you will find. There were so many little extras, like personalized breakfast menus, robes and slippers for the hot tub, cookies in your room everyday. Even a washer & dryer to use to catch up on laundry.

reviews.title: A fabulous place to stay!
reviews.text: The linens were so plush and plentifull. It was had to get out of the lush bed in the morning but you knew that Michelle and Ron were serving some of the most wonderful gourmet food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From Cape Cod to Alaska this B&B is tops! Rooms are beautiful & the breakfast sinfully good. All in all no matter your expectations you will not be disappointed !
reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment we arrived to warm cookies in our excellent room, to the menu of gourmet breakfast choices in the morning, our 2 nights at Hidden Creek were fabulous-wished we had a week more. Everything from the very good bed, great bathroom with high end products and soaps, the coffee machine outside our room in the common area 24/7 was far beyond our expectations. Before we arrived, Michelle by email helped me make reservations for boat trips and more. She had excellent suggestions for us and all were great. We are now planning a trip to Alaska again and will make Hidden Creek B&B our focal point of where to stay. This time we are making sure to stay longer! Rate this one A++++++++
reviews.title: Perfect Experience, Can't wait to go back for a longer stay!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This B&B is located in a scenic wonderland. The structure is a gorgeous tri-level Alaskan abode with all the comforts of home. The rooms are tastefully decorated with all of the amenities. The breakfast is very generous and delicious. We loved the bedding and the mattress. The hosts are very hospitable, friendly and excellent cooks. Be sure to say hello to Ziggy! This was our first stop during our vacation and it was a hard act to follow for the rest of our trip. I would most definitely stop at this B&B.
reviews.title: I had a restful and peaceful first night stay in Girdwood at the Hidden Creek

reviews.text: Hidden Creek B & B was the best place we stayed on our entire Alaska trip! It was beautiful, clean, super comfortable, the food delicious and the hosts friendly. Girdwood is a fun area with lots to do and see nearby. Go for it!
